name: Fix My Boss
description:
As a little Goblin, help your boss CybOrc get repaired and prevail in fights against the heroes, all while dodging their and your boss' attacks!

How to Play: 

     Avoid damage both from your Boss and the Heroes in this bullet-hell style arena, while trying to fix the damage inflicted to the Boss as well. You can play solo or in couch co-op! If you or your Boss' health drop too low, you lose. Keep the Dungeon Boss alive long enough for him to kill the Heroes to win!
